com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock
Class ActionBarSherlock.ActionBarHandler<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.ActionBarHandler<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Action bar class.
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionBarSherlock.NativeActionBarHandler
Enclosing class:
ActionBarSherlock
public abstract static class ActionBarSherlock.ActionBarHandler<T>
extends Object

Base class for handling an action bar that has been created by a ActionBarSherlock attachment.

onCreate

public void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

Callback method for when the attachment is complete and the handler may perform any additional actions in setting up the action bar.

This is implemented as an empty method so that overriding in a custom action bar implementation handler and/or an extension of a custom handler within an activity is optional.

Parameters:
savedInstanceState - Saved activity instance.

clicked

protected final void clicked(android.view.MenuItem item)
This should be called when an action bar button is clicked. This method will automatically pass the call on to the parent activity.

Parameters:
item - Clicked MenuItem.

getActivityLogo

protected final int getActivityLogo()
Attempt to fetch the logo for the specified activity. If no logo has been set for the activity, attempt to fetch the application logo. If that too cannot be found then a IllegalStateException will be thrown.

Returns:
Drawable resource ID of logo.

inflateMenu

protected final ActionBarMenu inflateMenu(int menuResourceId)
Inflate an XML menu into an ActionBarMenu.

Parameters:
menuResourceId - Resource ID of XML menu.
Returns:
Inflated menu.
